metadata.title: Agent Changelog - kOS Kitchen System Analysis & Integration Planning
metadata.purpose: Document all actions, decisions, and progress made during kOS kitchen system analysis

session_summary.primary_task: Analyze kOS kitchen system design documents and create comprehensive integration plan
major_achievements: Completed full analysis of kOS kitchen system architecture
Corrected node specifications to use proper Griot system classes
Established reusable ingredient patterns for recipe development
Prepared complete handoff documentation for next agent

detailed_actions.description: Read and analyzed entire kOS kitchen system design documents
findings: kOS system provides complete execution framework
Architecture is modular, deterministic, and scalable
Missing registry file and some configuration files
Agent specifications need correction for proper node classes

detailed_actions.description: Fixed inconsistent naming conventions throughout kOS system
changes_made: Updated all filenames to use 'kos' (lowercase) convention
Updated all content to use 'kOS' (mixed case) for system references
Updated all file references in index and registry files
issues_resolved: Broken file references in registry and index

detailed_actions.description: Restored missing files that were accidentally deleted
detailed_actions.validation: All restored files pass basic JSON validation

detailed_actions.description: Identified and documented proper node classes from Griot system
detailed_actions.current_status: Node roles not yet implemented - use generic agent framework for now

detailed_actions.recipe_specifications: Detailed specifications for all 17 recipes with ingredients, steps, and dependencies

detailed_actions.description: Prepared complete handoff documentation for next agent
documents_created: Integration plan with corrected node specifications
Agent workflow with mandatory process and guidelines
Changelog documenting all actions and decisions
detailed_actions.archiving: Prepared ARCHIVE/2025/07/ directory for proper file archiving

issues_encountered.resolution: Standardized to 'kOS' for system references, 'kos' for filenames
Restored from source document with corrected references
Identified proper Griot system node classes
Acknowledged as non-JSON format, focused on content extraction

decisions_made.decision: Use kOS as execution framework for all recipe tasks
decisions_made.rationale: Provides modular, deterministic, and scalable architecture

decisions_made.decision: Start with generic agent framework before specific node roles
decisions_made.rationale: Node roles not yet implemented, need foundation first
decisions_made.impact: Simplifies initial implementation while maintaining extensibility

decisions_made.decision: Create reusable ingredients for common operations
decisions_made.rationale: Enables modular recipe development and reduces duplication

decisions_made.decision: Focus on Phase 1 (Core Foundation) for immediate implementation
decisions_made.rationale: Provides essential foundation for all subsequent phases
decisions_made.impact: Establishes working system before adding complexity

next_steps.action: Begin Phase 1 implementation (01-05: Core System Foundation)

next_steps.focus: Basic roles (griot, oracle, runner, monitor, auditor)
Griot, Tohunga, Ronin, Musa, Hakim, etc.

recommendations: Follow atomic recipe structure (≤300 lines, ≤30k tokens)
Use kOS kitchen system as execution framework
Maintain deterministic execution and security-first approach
Document all changes and progress in agent changelog
Archive old files before creating new ones
Focus on Phase 1 success before advancing to Phase 2
Test each component thoroughly before integration
